title: Emotes not working
body: My emotes wont work. I have "Open Instant Emote Radial" binded to "T" key. When I'm in game and press "T" nothing happens and yes I have selected and saved the emotes in collection tab in the client. I have also restored default settings and it still wont fix the problem.

replies.body:
Hey guys, the only issues I'm currently seeing for emotes is that it wasn't working in TT earlier but since resolved.  Some emotes might also not have their sound play, but our devs intend get that fixed post-launch.  

If you're still having issues, toss me some more info on what you're seeing like screenshots, the emotes you're using, and what's not working.  We'll be able to use that info to dig into this more and see if something is going on.

Hi Porocles, I'm having the same issue where none of my emotes are loading into the game. I tried changing them around to save them and see if maybe saving a new set would work but I received an error when trying to save the emotes.

(Sorry for the multiple posts)
I get this error message/code when i try to save: https://i.imgur.com/ftdSihC.png
The 'Much Love' Emote isn't working for me, nether is the 'thumbs up' initially gifted emote. Both were key bound properly, and tried in multiple game modes.

> [{quoted}](name=Vensker,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ib7aVOMA,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-10-11T15:06:30.345+0000)
>
> My emotes wont work. I have &quot;Open Instant Emote Radial&quot; binded to &quot;T&quot; key. When I&#039;m in game and press &quot;T&quot; nothing happens and yes I have selected and saved the emotes in collection tab in the client. I have also restored default settings and it still wont fix the problem.

I don't even see anything about emotes in my "Hotkeys" menu!  Whats happening Riot?!
Emotes are temporarily disabled while our devs investigate an issue.  Keep an eye on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for now as updates come in!
is it bugged somehow? My friends tell me they´re able to use it but for me it won´t work.

Mine doesn't work either. I just bought one and it shows in the launcher settings that I can bind my keys to the emote menu but ingame nothing works. Neither does the settings of the emotes showing through the ingame options.
I also cant use my TSM emote which i also had bound to a mouse button. Is that still under mastery emote or something else. Neither are working for me.

My emotes are not working either. I bound the Instant emote radial and each directional emote and none come up in a game. I bought the bundle and currently am trying to use the sad mummy, ok Fiora, and the Jinx taunting one. 

None of them are working.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Yeah mine aren't working at all and the server status says nothing about it
Mine are not working either, and the messaging isnt on that page at least anymore.
My emotes aren't working either, but all my friends are :(

I'm having the same problem :/ but I don't see anything on the client about them having disabled it? Plus, I was just watching a stream where the players were using their emotes just fine... {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
bummer, I saw someone using it earlier... I just spent 2k in RP and no emotes.
